title: Drawing
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum for the Arts of Decoration (Lugt#457d)
inscribed: Pensiere del Teatro da eseguirsi in Perugia sotto nome/ del Sig. Vincenzo Cioffi Perugino l'Ano 1778. (Trans: Idea of how to execute decoration at Theatre at Perugia under the name of Signor Vincenzo Cioffi of Perugia, 1778)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Horizontal rectangle: Cross-section of theatre on the long axis showing entrance, orchestra with boxes, and stage.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing.
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-115.
